name: Frostfall
description: An endless winter grips this dimension. Vikings raid, survive, and honor their ancestors through battle. The cold is merciless, but so are those who survive it.

atmosphere.visual: Frozen tundra, longships, snow-covered mountains, aurora

charles.name: Farmer Charles
charles.title: The Provider
charles.description: In a land of warriors, he chose to feed them. His quiet strength has saved more lives than any sword.
charles.backstory: When the endless winter came, most took up weapons. Charles took up a plow. His farms beneath the ice feed the resistance.

legendaryNike.name: Viking Nike
legendaryNike.title: The Frost-Blooded
legendaryNike.description: The greatest warrior of Frostfall. Undefeated in combat, he seeks only worthy opponents.
legendaryNike.corruptionReason: The boredom of having no equal
legendaryNike.freedBy: Showing him that true strength is protecting others

harbinger.name: Erik
harbinger.title: The Eternal Raider
harbinger.description: Raided a thousand shores, won a thousand battles. Found nothing worth keeping. Nolem offered him endless war.

locations.name: The Frozen Shore
locations.description: Where dimensional travelers first feel Frostfall's bitter cold

locations.name: Farmer's Hold
locations.description: Underground farms where Charles grows food in magical warmth

locations.name: Resistance Camp
locations.description: Viking warriors who fight against the corruption

locations.name: The Ghost Fleet
locations.description: Ships frozen in ice, crewed by the corrupted dead

locations.name: The Usurper's Throne
locations.description: Where Erik holds court over endless raiders

dimensionalAnchor.name: Frostfire Axe
dimensionalAnchor.description: Burns with cold flame, warming allies and freezing enemies
